lines.text: Don't sneeze ya stupid dragon, or you'll blow us to the moon!
[Dragon sneezes and the tower "blasts off", headed for the moon]

[glares at his befuddled dragon]
Dragons is so stupid!
Open that bridge, varmit! Open it, I say!
[the drawbridge drops on top of Sam]
Close it! Close it! Close it up again!
[Drawbridge opens, leaving a flattened Sam]
Okay, rabbit, you forced me to use force!
Noble knights of the Round Table, ever since the accursed Black Knight captured our Singing Sword, evil times have befallen us. One of ye knights must recover the Singing Sword...
The Black Knight has a fire-breathing dragon!
But-but-but... but the Black Knight is invincib-b-ble!
Odds bodkins! Hath the knights of the Round Table turned chicken?
[Clucking sounds and feathers flying]

[as the court jester]
Yuck, yuck, yuck, yuck! Only a fool would go after the Singing Sword!
A good idea, *fool*. Unless you bring back the Singing Sword, you will be put to the rack, burned at the stake, and beheaded.
Be-be-beheaded?
[starts laughing, then crying]
[Sam's dragon is sneezing]
Ya crazy, idgit, bedraggled dragon! I warned ya about lettin' your fire get low! Now ya caught cold!

[after Bugs found the Singing Sword, at the Black Knight's castle and home]
I wonder why they call this the Singing Sword?
[singing Sword performs musical tune "Cuddle Up a Little Closer"]
[last lines]

[waving goodbye to Sam and his dragon]
Adios! Have a nice trip! Bon voyage! Farewell to thee!
[singing Sword performs musical tune "Aloha 'Oe"]
